# An application to explore the gapminder dataset

This is an assignment B4 completed for UBC Stat 545B course. 

The application explores the gapminder dataset contained in the gapminder package (https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/gapminder/README.html)

The app can be found at https://britttheuser.shinyapps.io/BCLAppUpdated/

## Here are the functionalities of the current app:
1. The application theme is set to be darkly
2. A slider is available to restrict the year range and a drop down menu of combined with (continued below)
3. A radio button to select whether to view life expectancy, population, or GDP per cap as a function of year 
4. A dropdown menu is also available to see overviews by continent
5. A tab to type in the country name to view
